title: Revocation or suspension of license
context: ยง291C-170 Revocation or suspension of license. In addition to the penalties heretofore provided, the court may revoke or may suspend, for a period not to exceed one year, the license of any driver convicted of a violation of any section or provision of the state traffic laws involving a vehicle in motion. [L 1978, c 111, pt of ยง2; am L 1979, c 105, ยง31]
